login.signupDescription: Join us to start building your content with b10cks.
login.terms: I agree to the [Terms of Service](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/terms-of-service) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/privacy-policy)

marketing.demo: Want to learn more? [Schedule a demo](https://www.b10cks.com/demo) with us.
marketing.description:
* Modular by design with atomic block architecture for seamless content composition
* User-focused visual editor with Git-like versioning and powerful API-first approach
* Enterprise features standard for everyone â€” global CDN delivery without premium pricing
* **No credit card required to get started**
marketing.footer: By using this service, you agree to the [Terms of Service](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/terms-of-service) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/privacy-policy).

input.placeholder: Type to search for spaces, blocks, content ...

search.searchOrSelectField: Search or select a field to filter...
search.typeValueAndEnter: Type to enter a value and press Enter
search.keyboardNavHint: Use up and down arrow keys to navigate, Enter to select, Escape to cancel

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: Manage your datasets and their entries.
datasets.noEntries: No entries found. Create your first entry to get started.
datasets.searchEntriesPlaceholder: Search entries by key or value...

fields.name: Name
fields.cacheTtlDescription: Time in seconds for which the dataset will be cached. Set to 0 for no caching.
fields.dimensionTranslatableDescription: Enable this if dimensions represent translatable content. This allows you to use AI features like translation.
fields.activeDescription: Enable this dataset to make it available for usage in the API.

datasets.editDataSourceDescription: Update the data source configuration and settings.
datasets.createDataSourceDescription: Create a new data source to organize your content data.
datasets.slugDescription: URL-friendly identifier (lowercase, numbers, and hyphens only)
datasets.noDataSources: No data sources found. Create your first data source to get started.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Data Source
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this data source? This action cannot be undone and all associated entries will be permanently removed.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Entry
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.

assetFolders.title: Asset Folders
assetFolders.createDescription: Create a new folder to organize your assets.

assets.noAssetsFoundDescription: Your asset library is empty. Upload your first asset to get started.
assets.uploadDescription: Upload files to your asset library. You can upload multiple files at once.
assets.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here or click to browse
assets.describeContent: Describe the content of the file

localization.label: Localization
localization.notAvailable: This space has no localization configured.

settings.disablePreviewDescription: Disable the preview panel for this content

blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: Manage your content blocks and their configurations.

fields.name: Name
fields.tagsPlaceholder: Assign tags to categorize this block
fields.tagsEmpty: No tags found. Create tags to organize your blocks.
fields.isRootDescription: Enable this block to serve as a standalone content type that can be created directly. Root blocks function like pages, posts, or products in traditional CMS systems.
fields.previewTemplateDescription: Use handlebars syntax to create a preview template.
fields.requiredTooltip: You won't be able to create an entry if this field is empty.
fields.translatableTooltip: This field can be translated using field level translations.
fields.blockWhitelistDescription: Restrict the blocks that can be used inside this block. Only the selected blocks will be allowed.
fields.tagWhitelistPlaceholder: Select tags to restrict block usage
fields.tagWhitelistDescription: Restrict blocks to only those with the selected tags. This allows you to create a curated set of blocks that can be used together.
fields.fileTypesPlaceholder: Select allowed file types for this block

root.label: Root Block
root.description: Define the main content structures for your experience - like blog posts, product pages, or landing pages. These serve as the foundation that users will navigate to.

nestable.label: Nestable Block
nestable.description: Reusable building blocks that make up your pages - like hero sections, image galleries, or newsletter signups. Mix and match these to create rich content experiences.

single.label: Unique Block
single.description: Site-wide unique blocks that appear once across your experience - like navigation menus, site settings, or footer information. These blocks can't have children.

universal.label: Universal Block
universal.description: Universal blocks that can be used anywhere in your content. They can be nested and reused across different content types, providing flexibility in your content structure.

link.label: Link
link.description: A link to another content or an external URL

markdown.label: Markdown
markdown.description: A text field with markdown support

blocks.label: Blocks
blocks.description: A field that can contain other blocks

option.label: Single Option
option.description: A field with a single option

blockTags.title: Block Tags
blockTags.description: Manage tags for your blocks to categorize and filter them.
blockTags.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the tag "{name}"?

blockFolders.title: Block Folders
blockFolders.description: Organize your blocks into folders for better management.
blockFolders.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the folder "{name}"? All blocks inside this folder will be moved to the root.

releases.title: Releases
releases.description: Manage your content releases and deployments.
releases.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the release "{name}"?

redirects.title: Redirects
redirects.description: Manage URL redirects for your site
redirects.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the redirect from "{from}"?

fields.fromDescription: The source path that will be redirected
fields.toDescription: The destination path where users will be redirected
fields.statusCodeDescription: HTTP status code for the redirect

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Manage your space settings and preferences.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Manage technical settings and integrations for your space.

people.title: People
people.description: Manage team members and their access to your space.

space.title: Space
space.description: Manage your space identity and basic information.
space.name: Name
space.nameDescription: This is the name that will be displayed throughout the application.
space.spaceIdDescription: This is your unique space identifier (read-only).

content.title: Content
content.description: Configure default content settings for your space.
content.defaultBlockDescription: This block type will be used when creating new content.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.warning: Deleting your space will permanently remove all content, settings, and user data. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your space and remove all associated data from our servers.

editor.title: Editor
editor.environmentsDescription: Configure preview environments for your content.
editor.name: Name
editor.visualEditorDescription: Enable or disable the visual editor for content creation.
editor.visualEditorInfo: The visual editor provides a WYSIWYG experience for content creators.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Configure language settings for your content.
i18n.languagesDescription: Add and manage supported languages for your content.
i18n.label: Label

accessTokens.title: Access Tokens
accessTokens.description: Manage API access tokens for your space.
accessTokens.name: Name
accessTokens.tokenWarning: Make sure to copy your new access token now. You won't be able to see it again!

assetLibrary.title: Asset Library
assetLibrary.description: Configure metadata fields for your asset library.
assetLibrary.label: Label

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.description: Configure AI features and monitor usage.
ai.featuresDescription: AI features include content suggestions, auto-tagging, and smart search.
ai.usageDescription: Your current token usage for this billing period.
ai.resetInfo: Your plan resets on {date}. Need more tokens?

members.title: Members
members.description: Manage team members and their permissions.
members.inviteDescription: Invite a new team member to collaborate on your space.
members.name: Name

preview.noContent: No content selected. Select a content item to preview.
